description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8tvsd","text":"In order to prepare high quality double-stranded DNA libraries for Illumina WGS, extracted genomic DNA needs to be accurately quantified. Qubit Fluorometers detect fluorescent dyes that are specific to the target of interest. These fluorescent dyes emit only when bound to specific target molecules, even at low concentrations. This provides obvious advantages over UV absorbance quantitation, which measures anything absorbing at 260 nm â€” DNA, RNA, protein, free nucleotides, or excess salts. Moreover, UV spectrophotometry often does not have the sensitivity to accurately measure low concentrations of DNA and RNA. The Qubit dsDNA broad-range (BR) and high-sensitivity (HS) assays are highly selective for double-stranded DNA (dsDNA) over RNA and single-stranded DNA (ssDNA). ","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5kcfh","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ov9l","text":"This protocol has been adapted from dsDNA quantification assays developed by ThermoFisher Scientific.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40alm","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aorr0","text":"Variations of this method include quantification assays from Promega:","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"41m58","text":"DNA quantification using the Quantus fluorometer","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":48}],"data":{}},{"key":"6ph8d","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eidk1","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2a3qb","text":"This steps.section: Reading Standards and Samples with the Qubit 4.0
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"poli","text":"On the home screen of the Qubit, press dsDNA, then select dsDNA: High Sensitivity or dsDNA: Broad Range depending on the kit being used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":39,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":58,"length":23},{"style":"bold","offset":85,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"44nj1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"le4b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Reading Standards and Samples with the Qubit 4.0
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2b30n","text":"Insert the tube containing Standard #1 into the sample chamber, close the lid, and press Read Standard. steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"57t6","text":"The instrument displays the results of the calibration immediately after S1 and S2 have been read. Record the concentration of the original sample, remove the tube and repeat steps 9.1 and 9.2 to record results for each additional sample.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"86rev","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":23,"offset":92,"style":"bold"}],"key":"7qotl","text":"ii. To manage and import assay readings directly from the instrument, refer to the relevant Fluorometer User Guide in the next section.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Reading Standards and Samples with the Qubit 4.0
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"79at5","text":"On the Sample Volume screen, select the volume of sample added to the tube and the output concentration units (i.e. ng/Î¼l or other).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":7,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Reading Standards and Samples with the Qubit 4.0
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"768nk","text":"Insert the first sample tube into the sample chamber, close the lid, and then press Read Tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":84,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4vb57","text":"Prior to initiating the protocol, ensure that all active workbenches are cleaned with 80% ethanol, all relevant personal protective clothing is worn and the work area is prepared for DNA quantification according to local GLP guidelines.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79u3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17k9e","text":"Create an organised bench space by clearing away all clutter in order to maximize work efficiency.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"4ha9j","text":"Take proper precautions and wear appropriate PPE when handling potentially hazardous chemicals. Ensure that chemicals, spent containers, and unused contents are disposed of in accordance with local safety standards.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9gps","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ffgec","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5lgje","text":"Qubit dsDNA Broad Range (BR) Reagent Kit: Refer to ThermoFisher Scientific's SDSs for additional information.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":109}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1cod4","text":"    â€¢ BR Reagent 200x in DMSO: GHS Category 4 for flammability, no data is available on the mutagenicity or toxicity of the reagent, it is known to bind nucleic acid so the same safety precautions should be used as when handling other potential mutagens.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2to9g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bke2","text":"    â€¢ BR Buffer: No GHS classification but may cause irritation with susceptible persons.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
